name: Flip (itch) (JUSTCAMH)
description:
Quickly run through a fast paced level with an awesome tune to keep you jamming. 

Use the standard 'jump' ability combined with a new one; flip. 

This will cause you to flip to the opposite side of the platform you are on, which makes for some interesting challenges! Enjoy non-linear levels, with varying paths of difficulty to suit you. If you enjoy collecting stuff, then this is also the game for you!

This game was made in four days for the JamGoJam JamDNA 1. All assets were created in the four days of production.
